mapper.sql: seq, title, createyear, artsize, imagepath, viewcount, TO_CHAR(regdate,'YYYY.MM.DD AM HH:MI') AS regdate, artist, painter, material

where.if:
(
OR artist LIKE '%'||#{artist}||'%'
OR painter LIKE '%'||#{painter}||'%'
OR material LIKE '%'||#{material}||'%'
OR title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%'
OR remark LIKE '%'||#{remark}||'%'
)

choose.when: ORDER BY title ASC, seq DESC
ORDER BY regdate DESC, seq DESC
ORDER BY viewcount DESC, title ASC
choose.otherwise: ORDER BY regdate DESC, seq DESC

mapper.select:
SELECT result1.* FROM ( SELECT , remark, LAG(seq,1,0) OVER () AS prevNum, LEAD(seq,1,0) OVER () AS nextNum FROM v_art
) result1 WHERE seq=#{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_art (seq, title, createyear, artsize, imagepath, viewcount, remark, regdate) VALUES(#{seq}, #{title}, #{createyear}, #{artsize}, #{impagepath}, 0, #{remark}, SYSDATE)
